attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As rover is no longer with us they are all Historic cars and also in british history and should have free road tax so that owners can put the money back into the cars keeping them alive and on the british roads for years to come

FREE TAX IS THE REQUEST AS MUST OF THE READ LAST TIME NUMBER 10 
 * Statements that don't actually request any action

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
